channel.title: Delta 317 - Being next to objects?
channel.description:
Looking for a bit of help, I know a lot of people have done this before.
Server is a delta based 317. I'm looking to add the functionality of being next to doors, NPCs, objects, etc. before they 'activate' and perform their various tasks. I was wondering if this is server sided or client sided and where I should look to add in my code. I'm not really looking for a copy+paste solution, but more of an understanding of how this system works.
It should be noted that I don't have much experience with Java, but I'm pretty well versed in c# and I know they are quite similar
